cmp: 包 (to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/to contract (to or for))
mng: to run, to run away, to escape, to run around (on errands etc), (of a gas or liquid) to leak or evaporate, (verb complement) away, off

exm.mng: to start running, the start of a race
the starting line (of a race), scratch line (in a relay race)
horse race, to ride a horse at a fast pace, wet dream
to flee from sth, to run away, to escape
jogging, to jog, to canter, a slow trot
to take the lead in a race, to set the pace
racing bicycle, sporting bicycle, sports car, logging truck, on the job (of a train conductor)
